title: [UX] Model list loading state + cache
description: Model selector shows empty list while fetching. Show 'Loading...' placeholder. Cache model list and show cached results immediately, fetch in background to update. List rarely changes so cache-first is good UX. Need to handle: 1) Show cached list on open 2) Background fetch for updates 3) Merge new models into list if changed 4) Avoid flicker/reflow if list updates while viewing
